cx-javascript: Bin ŋɔ ku tooi tum tuma diyi niŋ ka JavaScript kani. JavaScript ŋɔ kpihimi, bee di zaɣisi la tuma tumbu bee browser ŋɔ m be tumda.
cx-specialpage-enable-betafeature: [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Content_translation|Content Translation]] nyɛla binshɛli din lɛbigiri tunzuŋ yɛltɔɣa a ya balli ni yomyom. [$1 Lihi mili n-nya pumpɔŋɔ!]
cx-lost-session: A saha ŋɔ maa din na naaya
cx-lost-session-draft: A saha ŋɔ maa din na naaya. A tohibu ŋɔ maa pala binshɛli din ni tooi pahi yaha naɣila a lan labimi n-kpe
cx-lost-session-publish: A saha ŋɔ maa din na naaya. A tohibu ŋɔ maa pala binshɛli din ni tooi pahi yaha hali ka a ti lan labimi n-kpe
cx-lost-session-dashboard: A yi bɔri ni a tooi niŋ niŋsim ŋɔ, nyin dimi suɣulo ka labi kpe
cx-publish-summary: Di nambu maa yila "$1" lɛbigibu ni na
cx-sx-published-section-invitation-title: Lɛbigiri zuliya yɛltɔɣa yaɣ' shɛli yaha.
cx-sx-publisher-mt-abuse-message-title: A lahabali lɛbigibu maa malila $1 din lahabali bi taɣi
cx-sx-publisher-mt-abuse-message-body: Bashini/mashini lahabali lɛbigibu kuli nyɛla lahibali lɛbigibu piligu. A na ni tooi bahuili pɔhim zuɣu, amaa kpaŋmi a maŋa ka a lahabali shɛli a ni lɛbigi maa ni karim ka ŋmani a balli maa.
cx-sx-article-search-input-placeholder: Bɔmi yaɣili shee n-lɛbigi di zuliya yɛltɔɣa
cx-sx-article-search-recently-edited-tit: Nyini n na yoli taɣi li
cx-sx-article-search-no-search-results-m: Yaɣ' shɛŋa bi bɔ n-nya $1" in $2
sx-confirm-draft-translation-start-dialo: Tuɣi lɛbimi zuliya yɛltɔɣa maa tangalimii zuɣu
